text: The Little House in Kolomna () is a 1913 Russian silent comedy movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin.Объект немого восхищенияДомик в Коломне It stars Praskovya Maksimova, Sofya Goslavskaya, and Ivan Mozzhukhin. The movie is based on the 1830 poem The Little House in Kolomna by Alexander Pushkin. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1913 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: The Little House in Kolomna
